Hosted by Harvard Web Publishing Link: http://hwp.harvard.edu/ , and powered by OpenScholar Link: https://osprojectsite.org/ software, OpenScholar@Harvard Link: http://openscholar.harvard.edu/ offers you the next generation scholarly web site. With it, you can easily create and manage a highly dynamic, powerful, and customizable site, with an easy-to-use interface and a look and feel that is uniquely yours.
